attributes.action: Stop the Blood Shed in Syria
attributes.additional_details: It is time for Democracy to have its voice heard. Enough of faceless men in suits deciding the fate of free citizens. Stand up and be counted to stop the loss of innocent life. All people are free and equal and deserve their political voice to be heard. President Assad should be removed from office and the powers of the free world should act to stop this civil war - war is senseless but more so the innocnet loss of time. Remove this man from power by all meamns necessary
